content: *free pattern * https //www sweetsofties com/2023/02/penis-plush html the penis plush is a quick and easy project that requires no sewing as it is crocheted completely in one piece this doll makes a great gag gift for birthdays bridal showers valentine s day or even for your best girl or guy friend the same pattern can be used with thin yarn and a small hook to create a smaller version of this stuffed toy it s easily customizable with different yarn colors and add-ons such as bowties buttons hats and other accessories make yours spiffy or as unique as can be the pdf pattern includes photo references making this a beginner friendly project **size** height 7 5 inches 19 cm width 3 inches 7 5 cm **materials** * hobbii baby snuggle yarn or honey bunny yarn super bulky weight #6 in desired colors yarn i used https //hobbii mvk co/2g8s4 * 5mm crochet hook * 12mm plastic safety eyes eyes i used https //amzn to/3kgxjba * stuffing * yarn needle * scissors **level** ★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below and changing yarn colors **stitches & techniques used us terminology ** fo = fasten_off magic_ring = magic_ring decrease = decrease slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase blo = back loops only flo = front loops only *copyright notice this pattern is © 2023 sweet softies www sweetsofties com for personal use only you may not translate distribute copy alter or sell this pattern in any way my patterns may not be used in video tutorials or for teaching classes both online and in-person you may link to this pattern but you may not copy any part of the pattern instructions on other websites you may sell finished items made with this pattern if you credit sweet softies as the designer and link to my website no wholesale * www instagram com/sweetsofties @sweetsofties www etsy com/shop/sylemn www facebook com/sweetsofties www youtube com/sweetsofties www pinterest com/sweetsofties
